sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The id3lib package contains the libid3 library and id3convert, id3cp, id3info and id3tag.

sect3.title: libid3
sect3.para: libid3 provides functions for the ID3v1/v2 tag editing programs.

sect3.title: id3convert
sect3.para: id3convert converts between ID3v1/v2 tagging formats.

sect3.title: id3cp
sect3.para: id3cp extracts ID3v1/v2 tags from digital audio files.

sect3.title: id3tag
sect3.para: id3tag is an utility for editing ID3v1/v2 tags.
